title: Need a similar font of echelon
content:
Hello! EDIT: I wanted to know if there’s any font with the same caracteristics as the one from this example! tks..

Here is a sample

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160415im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/echelon.JPG)

 [‹ P's & Q's](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160415/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17407 "Go to previous forum topic") [vintage style travel poster ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160415/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17500 "Go to next forum topic")
author: xokolat

comments.content:
From Forums FAQ  
About Free Fonts:  
If you’re looking for free fonts, please see our article called FAQ: where to find “cool” free fonts. Do not ask members to send you copies of retail fonts. Such behavior is not looked upon kindly by those of us who make a living designing type or those of us who support the work of talented type designers. By the same token, please do not post links to sites with commercial fonts for download. If you do wish to report a site with this activity, please contact a moderator.

[http://typophile.com/wiki/FAQ\_free](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160415/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQ_free "http://typophile.com/wiki/FAQ\_free")

Tim
[Das herrliche Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160415/http:/www.hugohoppmann.de/herrlich.htm) by the young german hugo hoppmann seems kinda close. and its free to download on his website.

Here’s a free Echelon:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/echelon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160415/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/echelon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/echelon/")

“You can’t always get what you want / But if you try sometimes / you just might find / you get what you need.”

I’m really sorry, that wasn’t my intention... i don’t want an illegal copy of any font, i just wanted to know some similar fonts! of course i can search the free fonts sites, but that was what i already do, and i couldn’t find what i wanted! so i posted this topic here..  
Thanks for helping me kesh! that was exactly what i was looking for !!!  
anyway, i edited the topic, i hope now it’s ok!
